entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Halifax (Shearwater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:51 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shearwater Airport 10:00 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: NNW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast in the evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
